data.eml:eml: On the validity of some species names of South American longhorn beetles (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monné, Miguel A., Cupello, Mario (2015): On the validity of some species names of South American longhorn beetles (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). Zootaxa 3981 (3): 360-366, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.3.2
